title: Daji Chengzhang Ji season2
synopsis: There are a group of happy little friends living in Taoyuan mainland—who are always naughty and don’t listen to class, but are full of sense of justice at critical moments; the first-class grade seven, but from time to time be confused; the natural beauty Duo Duo, every day Only go out when they are dressed up... Taoyuan Village is their beautiful home, and the small college is a paradise for them to learn. However, three guys who always like to do sabotage followed them, doing everything possible to bully the children, but they made a lot of jokes and made the children gradually increase their awareness of self-protection, and learned a lot of disaster prevention, self-help, and emergency response. method. (translated from tenceng)
